document_data.mainbody:
Jarvis was one of the Maces of Elversult that guarded over Moonstorm House, the mansion-castle of the citys Lady Constable and Lady Lord.
He was a massive and intimidating man who spoke with distinct authority. He had brown eyes and dark, slicked-back hair.
The dutiful guard directly served at the pleasure of Lady Constable Vaerana Hawklyn.
Jarvis watched over the Harpers agent Ruha when she was given shelter in the Pearl Tower of Moonstorm house in the , following a days-long, exhausting mission infiltrating the Ginger Palace.
